Methods in com.sponsorpay.sdk.android.publisher that return OfferBannerRequest
static OfferBannerRequest SponsorPayPublisher.requestOfferBanner(Context context, java.lang.String userId, SPOfferBannerListener listener, OfferBanner.AdShape offerBannerAdShape, java.lang.String currencyName, java.lang.String applicationId)
          Requests an Offer Banner to the SponsorPay servers and registers a listener which will be notified when a response is received.

 void SPOfferBannerListener.onSPOfferBannerRequestError(OfferBannerRequest request)
